mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_role r left join sys_user_role ur on(r.id = ur.role_id) left join sys_user u on(u.id = ur.user_id) left join sys_role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.id) left join sys_menu m on(m.id = rm.menu_id ) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''

select m.* from sys_menu m where m.menu_type <> 1 and m.id in (select distinct rm.menu_id from sys_role_menu rm left join sys_role r on(rm.role_id = r.id) left join sys_user_role ur on(ur.role_id = r.id) left join sys_user u on (u.id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{userName}) order by m.create_time
